version_description:
In this update we have fixed a number of bugs and added a new feature: Item Randomiser
With this you can get a random selection of items to drop into the game with, on-demand.

We have also added support for the new 'Dark' item rarity.
Nothing major in this update, however we have added support for the new 'DC' item rarity which has been introduced recently.
In this update we have added the ability to view images relating to an item in full screen, just tap the 'Images' tab on an item page.
We have added support for the new 'Icon Series' rarity in this update and fixed a couple of visual/design bugs.

We have added support for three new item rarities: Frozen, Lava and Shadow.

Coming in a later update is the ability to view item sets within the app.

We have added support for the new Star Wars item rarity.

Coming in a later update is the ability to view item sets within the app.

In this update we have added the ability to view information about item sets.
Just tap the 'Set' tab on item pages to see all the items in the set.
In this version we have fixed a number of crucial bugs, including the in-game news feed being broken.

It's been a while since our last update, but we now have a new feature:
You can now use the item randomiser in 'owned' mode, so that you only get random items from those that you mark as owned.

We have also fixed a number of bugs and added the 'Slurp' rarity.

In this version we have fixed a number of bugs and added a small new feature: the number of users with an item reminder is now visible on item pages.

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

This update brings a couple of stability fixes to prevent some crashes we have received reports about.

Known bugs:
- 'Owned' Randomiser occasionally responds with no items

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

In this update we have added a new 'Owned Items' browser which allows you to see and filter all of the items you have marked as owned.
We have also fixed the issues with the 'Owned' randomiser not displaying the correct items when tapped. This bug only occurred if you had more than 25 items marked as owned.

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

This update brings numerous bug fixes and a new feature: you can now filter on the item browser by item type or rarity!

Other fixes in this update:
- The in-game news feed is working again
- Bundles did not always display their items correctly, this is fixed.
- Items within a set now sort by rarity and show the total number

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

This update brings numerous bug fixes and a new feature added in the previous release: you can now filter on the item browser by item type or rarity!

Bug fixes in this update:
- Removed an older item type (Creator Collab Series which has been renamed) from the filter menu
- Increased performance of owned items list

Previous fixes:
- The in-game news feed is working again
- Bundles did not always display their items correctly, this is fixed.
- Items within a set now sort by rarity and show the total number

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

This update brings a number of bug fixes including notification toggles not working on some devices.

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

In this update we have added the new 'Gaming Legends' rarity.

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

In this update we have given the app a lick of paint and refreshed the colour palette!

Other bug fixes & changes:
- The in-game news feed is working again.
- Your list of reminders is now sorted with the most recently seen first.

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!

In this update we have fixed and improved the reliability of the in-game news feed and generally improved the performance of images.

Thanks for using the fnbr.co app and supporting us!
